EmailTemplate.name: 2015-EMEAI-EBACE15-Event.EBACE15 Confirmation email
EmailTemplate.subject: EBACE 2015 - Honeywell Meeting Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}
Thank you for your interest in meeting with Honeywell at EBACE 2015. A Honeywell representative will contact you shortly to schedule a convenient time. Should you have any queries or experience any difficulties please contact Daniela Nova via email on Daniela.nova@honeywell.com <mailto:Daniela.nova@honeywell.com>
We look forward to welcoming you to the Honeywell stand (W089) at EBACE 2015.
Kind regards
Honeywell EBACE team.
